1108962113.description: The intersection in which a place or location falls. Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962113.label: intersection
1108962113.name: intersection

1108962115.description: The verified, groundtruthed location of a place. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108962115.label: groundtruth
1108962115.name: groundtruth

1108962119.description: The math centroid of the area polygon. Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962119.label: geom
1108962119.name: geometry

1108962121.description: Used when geocoding a location. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108962121.label: geocode
1108962121.name: geocode

1108962123.description: Used purely for display purposes. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108962123.label: display
1108962123.name: display

1108962125.description: An agreed-upon location. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108962125.label: consensus
1108962125.name: consensus

1108962127.description: Used for shading or creating patterns in proportion to the measurement of the statistical variable being displayed on the map. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108962127.label: cloropleth
1108962127.name: cloropleth

1108968883.description: The largest area of a geometry, minus outlying islands. Think San Francisco, minus Treasure Island and the Farallon Islands. Generally used to describe alt-geometry polygons.
1108968883.label: land
1108968883.name: land

1108962101.description: Tourists follow guides and flock towards famous attractions. Generally, where tourists assume a place is. Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962101.label: tourist
1108962101.name: tourist

1108962103.description: Used for point-in-polygon (PIP) processing. Generally used to describe a centroid or an alt-geometry polygon.
1108962103.label: reversegeo
1108962103.name: reverse geocode

1108962107.description: Snapped to nearest road and used to provide accurate turn-by-turn directions and navigation ETAs (expected time of arrivals). Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962107.label: nav
1108962107.name: navigation

1108962109.description: Where do locals from this place consider the 'center'? Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962109.label: local
1108962109.name: local

1108962111.description: Where the label should be displayed. Generally used to describe a centroid.
1108962111.label: lbl
1108962111.name: label
